dt: {bc}a covering for the head usually having a shaped crown and brim
{bc}a distinctive head covering worn as a symbol of office
{bc}an office, position, or role assumed by or as if by the wearing of a special hat

et: Middle English, from Old English {it}hæt{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}huot{/it} head covering {ma}{mat|hood|}{/ma}
shortdef: a covering for the head usually having a shaped crown and brim
a distinctive head covering worn as a symbol of office
an office, position, or role assumed by or as if by the wearing of a special hat

dt: {bc}to furnish or provide with a hat

shortdef: to furnish or provide with a hat

dt.t: have to go {it}hat in hand{/it} to apologize

shortdef: in an attitude of respectful humility

dt: {bc}the scoring of three goals in one game (as of hockey or soccer) by a single player
{bc}the dismissing {dx_def}see {dxt|dismiss||4}{/dx_def} of three batsmen with three consecutive balls by a bowler in cricket
{bc}a series of three victories, successes, or related accomplishments

dt.t: scored a {it}hat trick{/it} when her three best steers corralled top honors

et: probably from the former practice of rewarding the feat with the gift of a hat
shortdef: the scoring of three goals in one game (as of hockey or soccer) by a single player
the dismissing of three batsmen with three consecutive balls by a bowler in cricket
a series of three victories, successes, or related accomplishments

dt: {bc}a {d_link|hacker|hacker} who infiltrates a computer system for malicious purposes (as to disable a website or uncover secret information)

dt.t: In one segment … Assange reflects on his work as a {wi}black hat{/wi} hacker in the early 1990s, recalling wistfully how he and others hacked into the Pentagon's Security Coordination Center.

shortdef: a hacker who infiltrates a computer system for malicious purposes (as to disable a website or uncover secret information)

et: from the gold braid worn on the cap

dt: {bc}a hat with brim turned up to give a 3-cornered appearance
{bc}a hat with brim turned up on two sides and worn either front to back or sideways

shortdef: a hat with brim turned up to give a 3-cornered appearance
a hat with brim turned up on two sides and worn either front to back or sideways

dt: {bc}a conical-shaped usually straw hat worn especially to protect the head from the heat of the sun

shortdef: a conical-shaped usually straw hat worn especially to protect the head from the heat of the sun

dt: {bc}a wide-brimmed hat with a large soft crown

shortdef: a wide-brimmed hat with a large soft crown —called also ten-gallon hat

dt: {bc}to fly low in an airplane in a reckless manner {bc}{sx|hedgehop||}

et: from an alleged incident in which a pedestrian's hat was crushed by a low-flying plane
shortdef: to fly low in an airplane in a reckless manner : hedgehop
